title: Yen-dollar Exchange Rate
description:
Description
weekly observations from 1975 to 1989
number of observations :  778
observation :  country
country :  Japan
reference: Bekaert, G.  and  R.  Hodrick (1993) “On biases in the measurement of foreign exchange risk premiums”, Journal of International Money and Finance, 12, 115-138.

parameters.s30:
the bid price of the dollar in units of 
Yen in the spot market on the delivery 
date on a current forward contract
parameters.f:
the ask price of the dollar in units of 
Yen in the 30-day forward market on 
Friday of the current week
parameters.s:
the ask price of the dollar in units of 
Yen in the spot market on Friday of the 
current week
parameters.date:
the date of the observation (19850104 
is January, 4, 1985)
